name: Basketball Simulator
description:
See if you have what it takes to lead a basketball team to glory by testing out your coaching skills with Geeked-Out Basketball!

Use your knowledge of strategy and tactics to get your players performing on the court, while also keeping the locker room on your side and building chemistry within your team.

Your dreams of becoming a top basketball coach have never been closer to reality. All you need is right at your fingertips.

Manage your team to glory.

* Pick your team’s starting five, offensive and defensive plays, and rotational strategy
* Make key decisions in training and in games to help you start racking up more Ws
* Work on building momentum and team morale to get that feel-good factor in the locker room
* Collect Geek Points after each game, allowing you to progress as a coach as you lead your team up the conference

Highlights

* Every player is unique, with 12 displayed attributes and their own height and weight
* In-game sound effects and crowd reactions take you right onto the court
* Give instructions to your team during the game if you need to make a comeback or defend your lead
* Play single game mode for FREE, with Tournament and Season modes available via in-app purchase. This game has no ads.

Easy to play

* Our user-friendly interface makes for a fun & intuitive experience
* Custom-built for mobile, so no clunky graphics or slow loading times
* Every time you start a new game, variables are mixed up so the game is always fresh
* Customized game speeds and training methods allow you to be in full control as your team puts in the graft

We want to hear from you!

While you enjoy the current version of Geeked-Out Basketball, our developers are working hard to bring you upgrades for V2. By being an early adopter, you’ll have first-hand access to the game’s developer to help us improve for future releases.

If you have any questions, comments, or come across any bugs please send us an email at jamie@geekedoutgames.com and we’ll get back to you as quickly as we can.

Download Geeked-Out Basketball and see if you have what it takes to become the next Phil Jackson or Gregg Popovich!
